typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ActionFamily as string,
		SubActionFamily as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> ReadCreateActionFamiliesSubActionFamilies
ReadCreateActionFamiliesSubActionFamilies select(mapColumn(
		{$sourceId} = ActionFamily,
		{$targetId} = SubActionFamily),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> IdSelection
IdSelection derive({$relationshipName} = 'contains_SubActionFamily',
	{$relationshipDelete} = 'false',
	{$relationshipId} = {$sourceId} + 'to' + {$targetId}) ~> ModelDefinition
ModelDefinition sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['tmp_ActionFamiliesSubActionFamilies.v1.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteToTempRepo
source(output(
		ActionFamily as string,
		SubActionFamily as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> ReadTempStatusActionFamiliesSubActionFamiliesStatusEditor
ReadCreateActionFamiliesSubActionFamilies select(mapColumn(
		ActionFamily,
		SubActionFamily),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> StatusColumnSelectionActionFamiliesSubActionFamiliesStatusEditor
ReadTempStatusActionFamiliesSubActionFamiliesStatusEditor, StatusColumnSelectionActionFamiliesSubActionFamiliesStatusEditor union(byName: true)~> StatusUpdateActionFamiliesSubActionFamiliesStatusEditor
StatusUpdateActionFamiliesSubActionFamiliesStatusEditor sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['ActionFamiliesSubActionFamilies_status.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteTempStatusStatusUpdateActionFamiliesSubActionFamiliesStatusEditor
